answers.answer: No I have friend who was induced at 37 bc a year earlier she want until past her due date & gave birth to a still born. She was scared, the baby was fully developed & healthy so she asked the doctor to induce her & he did: everything went smooth & the baby was just perfect
Some women get induced early due to medical issues, gestational diabetes for example.
My doc will induce at 38 wks and sweep membranes at 37 so no its not wrong it just depends on ur doc
Yes with my first I was induced at 39 weeks and I plan on being induced again

Thank you ladies a lot, my dr is inducing me 40+5 because she said if I wait until this Monday the baby might die because placenta might age, I also have group b strep but she didn't talk about group b strep being risk. She told me she will treat it during labor when she found out I had it.
I was induced on the 9th (38+6) due to medical reasons (gestational diabetes, high protein in my urine and risk of preeclampsia). Good luck and best wishes!
Today I turn 38 weeks and I am being induced for medical purposes, originally I was going to be induced at 36 but things were looking good so we pushed our luck and waited.
Thank you @loveontop2014 I wish you great health and happiness you and your baby. @ sprmom87 thank you and I wish you the best of luck to deliver your baby health mom n health baby n happiness.
Thank you so very much @Naha890!! Keep us updated on your progress when you start labor. Good luck and hope you have a safe labor and especially delivery!

question: Isn't it wrong to be induced before you finished 41 weeks. I'm 40+3 and everything looks good.
